home.text: In the past, Con Dao Archipelago was known as “hell on earth”. Now, with a beautiful natural landscape, it has become a stunning “pearl” that attracts domesticand foreign tourists

about.title: Some features of Con Dao
about.desc: Con Dao is a district directly under Ba Ria - Vung Tau province
about.naturalDesc: Once you have stepped foot in Con Dao, visitors should not miss some places such as Hon Ba, Dam Tre Bay, Ong Dung beach, Hon Tai... to enjoy the diverse and lively natural landscape when there is a natural landscape. Harmonious combination of mountains and forests and blue sea.
about.historyDesc: Con Dao - the land of pain and suffering, is the place where many revolutionary soldiers as well as people lay down. Therefore, Con Dao possesses many famous historical sites.
about.specilitiesDesc: Have you found the delicious dishes of Con Dao when visiting this famous place? This must be a concern of many young people when visiting tourist attractions in Con Dao. VivuCondao will introduce to you the top gifts of Con Dao specialties that are worth trying once because of their irresistible deliciousness.
about.foodTitle: Top dishes to try when coming to Con Dao

service.title: Have you booked your tickets to Con Dao yet?
service.desc: To go to Con Dao, you can travel by plane or boat
